description: Enjoy all the benefits of living in a masterplanned community at Polygon's East Ridge at Cooper Meadows. The D plans are East Ridge range from 1,685 to 1,709 square feet. These 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathrooms are corner homes, allowing lots of natural light to brighten your home. These homes feature a double car garage, a convenient powder room on the main and spacious kitchen for friends and family to gather. These homes also boast a heat pump system to help keep your home the perfect temperature all year and access to The Cooper Club, a resident-only clubhouse featuring resort-style amenities such as a pool, fitness studio and more! We are open daily, except Fridays, from 12-5 pm. Visit us at 3025 McMillan Road to learn more!
